short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the history of Kijiji ads, allowing you to see price changes, description changes, and times when the ad was reposted.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed to provide more information to the Kijiji buyer so that they are able to make a more informed decision about what they're buying. For instance, if an ad has had its price reduced many times, the seller may be more receptive to bargaining than if the price had never been changed.
